channel.title: Killcount help? [Delta]
channel.description:
So i know what most people want when they ask about killcounts is how to make a player save int that adds +1 every time you kill an NPC, but i want something else.
I'm trying to figure out a way that i can count the total number of times a NPC is killed total. So no matter who kills the NPC the killcount will always go up one. How can i do this?
